name.en: Foundations of Space Entrepreneurship and Business Models
name.ch: 太空創業與商業模式基礎

goal.ch:
1. 理解太空創業的獨特商業模式和挑戰，並掌握相關的理論知識。
2. 探索太空產業中新興市場的機會，識別潛在的創業契機。
3. 發展創業技能，設計並評估可行的太空創業商業計畫。
goal.en:
1. Understand space entrepreneurship‘s unique business models and challenges while mastering the relevant theoretical knowledge.
2. Understand space entrepreneurship‘s unique business models and challenges while mastering the relevant theoretical knowledge.
3. Develop entrepreneurial skills by designing and evaluating viable business plans for space startups.

outline.ch:
課程將以太空創業專案為導向，專注於幫助學生將初步的創業構想發展成具體可行的商業計劃。
課程的主要授課方式包括講授、個案研究、專題討論與小組協作。學生將在課程中進行大量的閱讀、研究及討論，並藉由這些活動，釐清和完善他們的創業構想。
學生在課程開始前應有初步的太空創業構想，這將作為整個學期中研究和計劃的基礎。課程將引導學生深入探索太空產業的商業模式、風險管理、資金募集及市場進入策略，並針對創業計劃進行指導與回饋，幫助他們確立具體可行的方案。
課程結束時，學生將具備：
1.一個經過深思熟慮和優化的太空創業計劃。
2.對太空產業中潛在機遇和挑戰的深刻理解。
3.一份可用於吸引投資者的完整商業計劃書。
課程最終目標是幫助學生將創業構想轉化為現實的創業行動方案，並為未來的實際創業做準備。
outline.en:
This project-oriented course focuses on helping students develop their initial entrepreneurial ideas into concrete, viable business plans. The primary teaching methods include lectures, case studies, group discussions, and collaborative projects. Students will engage in extensive reading, research, and discussions to refine and clarify their business ideas.
Students are encouraged to have an initial space entrepreneurship idea before starting the course, as it will serve as the foundation for their research and planning throughout the semester. The course will guide students through exploring business models, risk management, fundraising, and market entry strategies within the space industry. Individual feedback and personalized guidance will be provided to help students refine their entrepreneurial projects into actionable plans.
By the end of the course, students will have:
1.A well-thought-out and optimized space entrepreneurship plan.
2.A deep understanding of the opportunities and challenges within the space industry.
3.A complete business plan ready to be presented to potential investors.
The ultimate goal of the course is to assist students in turning their entrepreneurial ideas into real-world ventures, preparing them for actual startup endeavors.
